mapper.select: SELECT *, employee.id e_id, employee.`name` FROM authority RIGHT JOIN employee ON authority.id = employee.id WHERE authority.id = #{id}

SELECT authority.id, '***' as password, authority.admin, authority.salesperson, authority.storageperson, authority.inventoryperson,authority.stockmanager, employee.id AS e_id, employee.name, employee.sex, employee.phone, employee.hiredate, employee.birthday FROM authority RIGHT JOIN employee ON authority.id = employee.id
